Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell believes that the side is all geared up to face a familiar England side in their highly anticipated Super 8 fixture on June 20 in the 2024 T20 World Cup.
Both sides have met many times for competitive series across different formats, and Powell highlighted their familiarity with this England side due to previous series.

Powell will have high confidence in his side before their crucial Super 8 fixture, after the West Indies thrashed Afghanistan in a one-sided affair at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, St Lucia on June 18, Tuesday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies qualified for the Super 8 with a perfect points tally.
England's road to the knockouts was not that pretty, and it was only due to Australia defeating Scotland that let Jos Butler-led England go through as the second-placed team from Group B.
Powell reflected on his side's mindset before the England clash and how much they know about their opponent.
Others: The West Indies thrashed Afghanistan in a one-sided affair at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, St Lucia on June 18, Tuesday.
England decimated Oman in their Group B match of T20 World Cup 2024 after bowling their opponents out for just 47 and then chasing down the target with 101 balls and 8 wickets to spare.
